sentences.en: A predatory striker who plays off the shoulders of the last defender.
sentences.cn: 嗅觉灵敏的射手,擅于突破最后一名后卫的防守.

sentences.en: He strongly criticized the genetic industry as greedy anarchical, predatory, and confused.
sentences.cn: 他尖锐地批判了基因工业的几大问题:贪婪、无法 、 掠夺和混乱.

sentences.en: People who run small businesses are frightened by the predatory behaviour of the banks.
sentences.cn: 小公司经营者被银行的掠夺行为吓坏了。

sentences.en: Predatory Instincts doesn't work with Bear and Dire Bear form anymore.
sentences.cn: 狩猎天性不再作用于熊或巨熊形态.

sentences.en: Predatory pricing by large supermarkets was threatening the livelihood of smaller businesses.
sentences.cn: 大型超市的掠夺性价格正威胁着小商店的生计。

sentences.en: Sam's interest tends towards the reputedly'ugly'and predatory side of the sea.
sentences.cn: 山姆钟情于海洋所谓 “ 丑陋 ” 和弱肉强食的一面.

sentences.en: She was safe from predatory birds on the verandah.
sentences.cn: 在阳台上她不会遭到猛禽的袭击.

sentences.en: The company spent much effort in avoiding takeover bids from predatory competitors.
sentences.cn: 公司投入大量精力来防止来自非善意性竞争者的收购投标.

sentences.en: The domesticated cat retains its predatory instincts.
sentences.cn: 猫依然保持着捕食动物的天性.

sentences.en: The earthbound larvae from which they develop are less pretty, but just as predatory.
sentences.cn: 幼虫生活在地面上，不像成虫后那么美丽，但是同样会捕食。

sentences.en: The only just wars are non - predatory wars, wars of liberation.
sentences.cn: 世界上只有 非 掠夺性的谋解放的战争, 才是正义的战争.

sentences.en: The point seems particularly clear for the young of predatory animals.
sentences.cn: 这一点在食肉动物的幼兽身上表现得特别明显.

sentences.en: They lie in shallow water to escape the predatory attentions of bigger fish.
sentences.cn: 它们呆在浅水里以躲避被大鱼盯上而捕食.

sentences.en: You don't think she was completely un - classy and predatory?
sentences.cn: 难道你不认为她低俗和暴露了一点?

words.tran_cn: [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者
掠夺的，掠夺成性的；食肉的；捕食生物的

phrases.tran_cn: 掠夺性订价；掠夺性价格

trans.tran_cn: 掠夺成性的，食肉的，捕食生物的
trans.tran_en: a predatory animal kills and eats other animals for food
